name: Bubble Blaster
description: Float through a dreamy bubble maze in this gentle indoor ride filled with glowing soap orbs and pixel fish!

name: BitCoaster X
description: A retro-futuristic rollercoaster with pixel trails and neon lights! Zoom through 8-bit loops and pixel explosions.

name: Candy Circuit
description: Ride sugary rails through a giant candy kingdom, complete with pixelated gumdrop hills and chocolate rivers.

name: Sky Pals
description: Board your flying pixel critter and gently soar above the park. Each ride features a different sky buddy!

name: Dungeon Drop
description: Drop into a dark, pixel dungeon filled with spooky sprites and sound effects. A vertical free-fall for brave adventurers!
